name: The Gleam
description: Unleash a radiant coat with The Gleam Dog Shampoo, our best-selling formula. Infused with oatmeal, honey, and beeswax, itâ€™s the ultimate solution for a moisturized, nourished, and gleaming coat.

name: The Sensitive
description: The Sensitive Dog Shampoo offers a hypoallergenic cleanse for pets with sensitive skin. Enriched with manuka honey, argan oil, aloe vera, and chamomile, it hydrates and calms dry, itchy skin.

name: The Curly
description: Specially formulated for poodles, goldendoodles, and similar breeds, The Curly Dog Shampoo harnesses the power of coconut oil, shea butter, and hydrolyzed soy protein to unleash effortlessly detangled, lifted, and beautifully defined curls.
